General.Name: Xinjiang Guannong Fruit & Antler Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Xinjiang Guannong Co.,Ltd. engages in processing and selling agricultural products in China. Its products include cotton, tomato, sugar, as well as fruit and vegetables. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Korla, China.

2.Name: Ms. Jian Xia  Jin
2.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board of Directors & Director
